title: glib doesn't build with python ~pythoncmd
body:
glib requires python3 to compile. The glib package does replacements to use python, which doesn't work if the spack python3 was installed with ~pythoncmd.

```
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

5 errors found in build log:
     1098      GEN      stamp-testmarshal.h
     1099    'import site' failed; use -v for traceback
     1100      File "../../gobject/glib-genmarshal", line 97
     1101        'g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__VOID',
     1102                                       ^
     1103    SyntaxError: invalid syntax
  >> 1104    make[4]: *** [stamp-testmarshal.h] Error 1
     1105    make[4]: Leaving directory `/tmp/andy.wettstein/spack-stage/spack-
             stage-vrRci5/spack-src/tests/gobject'
  >> 1106    make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1107    make[3]: Leaving directory `/tmp/andy.wettstein/spack-stage/spack-
             stage-vrRci5/spack-src/tests'
  >> 1108    make[2]: *** [all] Error 2
     1109    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/andy.wettstein/spack-stage/spack-
             stage-vrRci5/spack-src/tests'
  >> 1110    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1111    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/andy.wettstein/spack-stage/spack-
             stage-vrRci5/spack-src'
  >> 1112    make: *** [all] Error 2
```

I did this, but maybe there is something better:
```
diff --git a/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/glib/package.py b/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/glib/package.py
index 0414c0619..f0c536376 100644
--- a/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/glib/package.py
+++ b/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/glib/package.py
@@ -100,7 +100,7 @@ class Glib(AutotoolsPackage):
         files = ['gobject/glib-genmarshal.in', 'gobject/glib-mkenums.in']
 
         filter_file('^#!/usr/bin/env @PYTHON@',
-                    '#!/usr/bin/env python',
+                    '#!/usr/bin/env python3',
                     *files)
 
     @run_before('configure')
@@ -119,7 +119,7 @@ class Glib(AutotoolsPackage):
             copy(dtrace, dtrace_copy)
             filter_file(
                 '^#!/usr/bin/python',
-                '#!/usr/bin/env python',
+                '#!/usr/bin/env python3',
                 dtrace_copy
             )
 
@@ -136,7 +136,8 @@ class Glib(AutotoolsPackage):
         # to rebuild files as filter_file updates the timestamps)
         if self.spec.satisfies('@2.53.4:'):
             pattern = '^#!/usr/bin/env python'
-            repl = '#!{0}'.format(self.spec['python'].command.path)
+            #repl = '#!{0}'.format(self.spec['python'].command.path)
+            repl = '^#!/usr/bin/env python3'
             files = ['glib-genmarshal', 'glib-mkenums']
         else:
             pattern = '^#! /usr/bin/perl'
```
